mapper.select: select prdt_id, prdt_genre, prdt_name, (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 as "prdt_percent", prdt_currenttotal, (prdt_enddate-current_date) as "prdt_dday", row_number() over(order by (prdt_currenttotal/prdt_goal)*100 desc,prdt_id desc), prdt_thumbnail from tb_product where current_date-7 <= prdt_opendate and prdt_opendate <= current_date limit 3
